name: Arc (itch) (homemade2021)
description:
Inspired by the 80s, a 3D flyer / shooter - can you reach the end and destroy the Core

Arc comes from the question that drives us, the question that brought us here......that thing I saw in another game, or maybe something I created, can I work out a way to code it myself. 

The answer with GameMaker Studio 2 of course is, Yes you can !

I wanted to try something in 3D. This is built from scratch using simple 3D objects and techniques (that I could understand). Of course that means there’s lots of things that can be improved, but that’s OK because I’m still learning.

My goal is to have fun and create a game I actually enjoy playing, a journey from Neon in level 1 to Neo in level 3.

I hope you enjoy it too. 

[original inspiration: 3D Starstrike / 1985 Realtime Software]
